pullrequest.title: Allow larger values in joint controller

content.html:
I haven't tested this, but when I print GZ_DBL_MIN on my mac, I see 2.22507e-308, which is close to 0, when it appears to represent roughly -Inf in the context of this pull request. Does it work correctly on Ubuntu?

#include <iostream>
#include <gazebo/math/Helpers.hh>

int main()
{
  std::cout << "GZ_DBL_MIN " << GZ_DBL_MIN << std::endl;
  return 0;
}

$ c++ -I/usr/local/include/gazebo-4.0 main.cc && ./a.out
GZ_DBL_MIN 2.22507e-308
